vooga.towerdefense.attributes

Class AttributeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • vooga.towerdefense.attributes.AttributeManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultAttributeManager

    public class AttributeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Attributes object that helps to track all game element attributes. It also provides info requested by view through controller. Used by game elements and also any other class that needs attribute management.
    Author:
    Matthew Roy, XuRui, Zhen Gou

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AttributeManager() 
      AttributeManager(java.util.HashSet<Attribute> attributes)
      Creates an attribute manager based on a set of attributes

        public void update()
